Text: your request for October and two nightsDear Ms Watson thank you for your kind fax of yesterday and for your interest in our hotel I am afraid but we do not have enough double rooms left available for the dates you require If at all suitable for you over the same dates we can offer you one of the following accomodations either TWO triple rooms OR one double room and one large room for four people all our rooms have private showerWC color TVradio air conditioning and telephone The daily rate for such rooms in that period extremely busy is Lit for each triple room OR Lit for the double room and Lit for the quadruple one which at the moment works out to be around US or per night including buffet breakfast and all taxes and service charges Should you wish to book and I really hope so we would need a confirmation email or fax from you together with your Visa Master Amex or Diners Club credit card number and expiration date which will only prove as a guarantee of your arrival Otherwise you can email or fax us the confirmation and then send us a cheque for the first nights amount but this takes longer and is more expensive both on your and on our side Please note that cancellations or amendments should be made in writing up to one week before arrival at the latest otherwise the amount of the first cancelled night will be charged Our hotel is very centrally located only yards away from Florence Cathedral and very close to all monuments and museum In order to reach it from the Railway Station there is a choice of three options a taxi will cost around Lit and is readily available from the main exit in front of tracks no by bus lines or from the side exit by track no get off at the stop after the Cathedral and walk another yards on the other side of the street walk all the way minutes leave the Station by the side exit by track no take the underpass to the right until the end of it and then keep going straight ahead for about yards until reaching the Cathedral a massive white church at that stage turn left into Via Martelli which becomes Via Cavour after yards I hope that we shall be able to warmly welcome you all to our small and family managed hotel and I can assure you that we shall endeavour to make your stay in Florence as pleasant as possible Yours sincerely Paolo Lombardi Secretary Hotel Casci Via Cavour Firenze Italy Ph Fx Web site
